backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing makeup booking system with services, bookings, user profiles, time slot management, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features for displaying service area information (Hyderabad, Secunderabad, and outskirts) across homepage and footer components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, styles, and configuration with descriptions of their functionality and content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with beauty-industry aesthetic including rose gold and soft cream tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title 'Naaz Studio - Makeup Booking' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, services, booking, confirmation, and admin pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying shield alert icon and message for unauthorized admin page access with navigation button to return home.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout component with sticky header containing logo, navigation links, 24/7 badge, book button, login button, and footer displaying contact phone numbers with service area information and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component managing Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/PortfolioGallery: Reusable portfolio gallery component displaying images in responsive grid with hover effects and lightbox dialog for full-size image viewing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, email, and phone number. Prevents dismissal until profile is completed.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that displays loading state during initialization, shows authentication prompt for unauthenticated users, and renders children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryC: Card component displaying a service with image, name, description, duration, price, optional location, and a booking button. Features hover effects and gradient overlays.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberProfil: Card component showing team member details (name, title, bio) alongside a 2x2 grid of portfolio images with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state changes and initializing access control with admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for all backend operations including services, bookings, time slots, user profiles, and admin functions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom rose gold and cream color scheme defined as CSS variables for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing bookings with service selection, date picker (calendar), and table displaying bookings with status update controls. Includes access control check using useIsCallerAdmin hook.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Confirmation page displayed after successful booking, showing the booking ID and providing navigation buttons to return home or book another appointment.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Main booking form page where users select a service, date, time slot, and enter contact information (pre-filled from user profile if available) to create an appointment.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, 24/7 availability badge, service area information, portfolio gallery, and team member profiles. Includes navigation to booking and services pages.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays all available services in a grid layout using ServiceCategoryCard components, with service-specific images and locations mapped based on service names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and parameter cleanup functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including fonts (Inter, Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond), OKLCH-based color system with CSS variables, custom shadows, border radius, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking 19 versions of a makeup appointment booking website (Naaz Studio) with features including service listings, booking forms, admin views, homepage design, team profiles, and portfolio display.
